Uses of Package
ussr.description.geometry

Packages that use ussr.description.geometry
ussr.description.geometry Geometric shapes and properties for defining robots or obstacles in the simulated world. 
ussr.description.robot Basic building blocks for describing robots in terms of the individual components that make up the module, connectors mounted on each module, etc. 
ussr.description.setup Classes for defining the overall setup of the simulation. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
ussr.physics An abstract model of a physics engine, serves as the interface between physics-engine independent classes and the physics engine. 
ussr.physics.jme A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine). 
ussr.physics.jme.actuators Provides a collection of actuators for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.physics.jme.connectors Provides a collection of connectors for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.physics.jme.sensors Provides a collection of sensors for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.samples Generic infrastructure for simulations as well as examples of simulations mixing different robots. 
ussr.samples.atron Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.mtran Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot 
ussr.samples.odin Defintion of the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot. 
 

Classes in ussr.description.geometry used by ussr.description.geometry
CylinderShape
          A description of a cylinder geometry for use in building a robot
GeometryDescription
          Common interface for geometry descriptions (that can be used for building a robot)
GeometryDescriptionImpl
          An implementation of the GeometryDescription interface that provides the copy operation.
RotationDescription
          A physics-engine independent representation of a rotation TODO: make it physics engine independent :-)
VectorDescription
          A physics-engine independent description of a vector.
